name: The Odor Eliminator 32oz
description:
Instantly purge odors from the air, fabrics, curtains, carpets, linens, pet areas, bedding, gym bags, or anywhere! The Odor Eliminator encapsulates malodors and leaves a fresh linen scent behind. It is environmentally friendly and safe to use around kids and pets!

Our products are available in both individual and master case quantities:

Individual: 1 The Odor Eliminator 32oz
Master Case: 6 The Odor Eliminator 32oz

name: The Uber Aire freshening unit
description: The Uber Aire freshening unit is easily installed into your furnace ductwork at your home or business in less than five minutes.  You can now kick the sprays, candles and plugins and save money because our air fresheners last 30 days and will make your house smell amazing using the scent of your choice. Our air fresheners range from $4.99-$5.99 and beat the cost of candles, sprays and plugins hands down and lasts for 30 days!  The Uber Aire freshening unit has a lifetime warranty and can be installed by you or us.  Just give us a call to arrange the installment.

name: The Tag w/ suction cup - Wintergreen
description:
The Tag contains 100% more fragrance than typical air fresheners and lasts for a full 30 days. It’s versatility lets you hang it from all sorts of places like doorstops, toilet handles, cabinets, corners, storage rooms, closets, paper towel dispensers, garbage cans, or even cut up in your vacuum cleaner! Compared to most gel or metered aerosol air fresheners, the tag is manufactured with 50% less energy. It also contains only one type of material, so no cleaning or separated needed and no harmful chemicals to dispose of. Hang Tags contain 1/10 the VOC’s of most aerosols and are available for sale in all 50 states.

Our products are available individually and box quantities: 
•Individually: 1 The Tag w/ suction cup 
•Box: 12 The Tag w/ suction cup

options.name: Individual - 1 The Tag w/ suction cup
Box - 12 The Tag w/ suction cup

name: The Air - Kiwi Grapefruit
description:
The Air is a passive air freshening system that delivers a powerful, consistent freshness for 30 days. It is capable of freshening your largest spaces without any batteries or fans, in addition to its own dispenser. No matter what you put it in, or where you hang it, The Air cannot break or spill. It works well in restroom stalls, on restroom walls, conference rooms, entry ways, lobbies, trash rooms, living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, laundry rooms, offices, garages, data centers, basements, furnace rooms, boiler rooms, attics, or near soiled linens. Get creative! The Air is also 100% recyclable and is part of a closed-loop recycling program that allows you to easily recycle.

Our products are available individually and case quantities: 
•Individually: 1 The Air
•Case: 36 The Air

name: The Wave - Mango
description:
The Wave combines the patented technology of a 30 day air freshener/deodorizer, with the luxury of being versatile to use in almost any space you want to freshen/deodorize. The Wave also provides an easy to use out indicator system to assist in timely maintenance. This air freshener pairs perfectly with your car, service vehicles, trashcans, litter boxes and urinals.  Try pairing it with another scent to create a combo.

Our products are available individually and in both inner box and master case quantities: 
•Inner Box: 10 The Wave
•Master Case: 60 The Wave
